item.title: SiPHYC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Seita.9G089700 Gene Symbol: SiPHYC Gene Name: PHYTOCHROME C Genome: Species: Setaria italica Functional Descriptions: Here, genomic variations of PHYTOCHROME C (PHYC) between wild and cultivated Setaria gene pools were analysed and three SiPHYC mutants were identified.

item.title: SiPSY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Seita.4G288600 Gene Symbol: SiPSY1 Gene Name: Phytoene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Setaria italica Functional Descriptions: Genome-wide association analysis identified SiPSY1 as the candidate regulatory gene for yellow grain pigment in foxtail millet.

item.title: SiSTL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Seita.4G058800 Gene Symbol: SiSTL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Setaria italica Functional Descriptions: SiSTL1, encoding a large subunit of ribonucleotide reductase, is crucial for plant growth, chloroplast biogenesis, and cell cycle progression in Setaria italica.
